docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: SCIENTIFIC inquiry into personal memory is revealing the forces that create, distort and sometimes erase the images that constitute each person's autobiography.

headline.main: IN MEMORY, PEOPLE RECREATE THEIR LOVES TO SUIT THEIR IMAGES OF THE PRESENT
